message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Can you meet me halfway?

I understand that $100 is a good starting point, but I'm not willing to go that low. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my original offer, so I'll counter with $135. I think this is a fair price for the product's value.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway from your new offer, so I'll counter with $120. Can we meet in the middle again?
